title: ONE DAY SALE - 1882 Providence Cabinet (H. Wright, G. Wright, J. Ward & C. Radbourn
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: ONE DAY SALE - 1882 Providence Cabinet (H. Wright, G. Wright, J. Ward & C. Radbourn
posts.post_content:
Good Morning, Collectors:

Up for sale today is a very scarce 1882 Chicago Photographic Studios - Providence Grays BB Team Cabinet Card picturing 4 HOF'ers (Harry Wright, George Wright, John Ward & Charles Radbourne) which has been graded an SGC 10 by the strict graders at Sportscard Guaranty Company, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review scans of the front and back of the card before it was encapsulated by SGC as well as after it was graded. 

I am listing this card for sale for one day only and the buyer will be the first person to e-mail me privately at: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url] prior to 4:00pm EST on Tuesday, July 28. Otherwise, this card will go back into my personal collection and may not be for sale on the open market for a long time. My selling price for this cabinet card is $7,500.00 firm.
